ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.SUBTITLE: Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
POINTS: Where are you located? Are you open to different ways of working, such as working remotely or even relocating?
Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution?

MY_SKILLS.HEADLINE: My skills
MY_SKILLS.INTRO: Showcase of front-end technologies I have worked with.
MY_SKILLS.LEARNING: I’m eager to learn and apply new technologies and frameworks.

PORTFOLIO.INTRO: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

CARDS.TITLE: Join
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

CARDS.TITLE: 1-Bit Horror Game
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: A jump, run, and throw game built using object-oriented principles. Collect coins and rare fireballs scattered across the map to defeat skeletons and a dangerous cyclops—who can only be defeated using these scarce fireballs.

CARDS.TITLE: Pokedex
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

CARDS.TITLE: Ring of Fire
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: An Angular-based multiplayer game using Firebase for real-time data synchronization and player state management.

TESTIMONIALS.NAME: V. Schuster - Team Partner
TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE: Henning really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.

TESTIMONIALS.NAME: E.Eichinger - Team Partner
TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE: Henning was a top team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility made a significant contribution to us achieving our goals.

TESTIMONIALS.NAME: I.Nuber - Frontend Engineer
TESTIMONIALS.QUOTE: It was a great pleasure to work with Michael. He knows how to push and encourage team members to present the best work possible, always adding something to brainstorm. Regarding the well-being of group members, he was always present and available to listen and help others, with a great sense of humor as well.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Got a problem to solve?
DESCRIPTION: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.

TEXT: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

ACCESSDATA.TITLE: Access Data
ACCESSDATA.SUBTITLE: When you visit this website, the hosting provider automatically collects certain information, including:
BULLETPOINTS: Date and time of the request
ACCESSDATA.TEXT: This data is collected for technical purposes only, to ensure the stability and security of the website. It is not combined with other data sources.

CONTACTFORM.TITLE: Contact Form
TEXT: If you contact me via the contact form, the information you provide (such as your name, email address, and message) will be processed solely for the purpose of handling your request.
The processing of this data is based on Article 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures) or Article 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest in responding to inquiries).
Your data will not be shared with third parties without your consent and will only be used to process your request.

DATASTORAGE.TITLE: Data Storage
DATASTORAGE.TEXT: Your personal data will be stored only for as long as necessary to process your inquiry or as required by applicable legal obligations.

RIGHTS.TITLE: Your Rights
BULLETPOINTS: Request information about your stored personal data
Object to the processing of your personal data
RIGHTS.TEXT: To exercise these rights, please contact me using the email address provided above.

ENCRYPTION.TITLE: SSL or TLS Encryption
ENCRYPTION.TEXT: This website uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons. This ensures that data transmitted to this website cannot be read by third parties.

CHANGES.TITLE: Changes to This Privacy Policy
CHANGES.TEXT: I reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy if necessary to reflect legal requirements or changes to this website.

MAINTEXT.TITLE: Acceptance of Terms
MAINTEXT.TEXT: By accessing and using this Portfolio website (“Portfolio”), you acknowledge and agree to the following terms and conditions, as well as any policies or amendments thereto that may be presented from time to time. The operator reserves the right to update or change these terms at any time without prior notice.

MAINTEXT.TITLE: Scope and Purpose of the Website

It has an educational purpose and is not intended for extensive personal & business usage. As such, we cannot guarantee consistent availability, reliability, accuracy, or any other aspect of quality regarding this Product.
